event.title: 1775, Amos Brownson and John Chamberlain made

data.event: In 1775, Amos Brownson and John Chamberlain made the first settlement attempt.

event.title: their efforts in the fall of that year

data.event: They abandoned their efforts in the fall of that year, but returned in the spring of 1784, at the close of the Revolutionary War.
They abandoned their efforts in the fall of that year, but returned in the spring of 1784, at the close of the Revolutionary War.

event.title: was incorporated by the General Assembly on October 27, 1794

data.event: Richmond was incorporated by the General Assembly on October 27, 1794, then organized in 1795.
Richmond was incorporated by the General Assembly on October 27, 1794, then organized in 1795.
